item.title: Massacred world is back with new client! [317]
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

i am infamy:

You guy’s look at this server right now and think it’s a piece of shit server but your wrong, back in the day’s massacred was the best pk server you can ever play… right now we have gay servers like matrix where it looks completely like runescape (which is shit) but back then this was the most amazing server you can play just saying.

Well it’s not back then now is it?
“gay servers like matrix where it looks completely like runescape (witch is shit)”
Called opinion you stupid fucker, allot of people like the newer graphics of 600+ servers, or even the 317 loading 600+, otherwise they wouldn’t play it. In fact, allot of the older, classic style servers don’t get many players any more just due to the fact that it’s allot of the same bugs, just lesser graphics.
I don’t mean to seem oh so hostile, but it’s true, we all have our opinions, so there’s no need to go and call servers like that shit, keep it to yourself.

Read full topic
